response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premier product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This unique offering is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and quality that can significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value, I propose a special introductory price of $8,500 for you. This opportunity is exclusive to you, and I believe it represents a fantastic investment that could potentially yield substantial returns or benefits tailored to your needs. I look forward to discussing how this product can be a game-changer for you. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further details.", "product_price": 8500}
